help-file.title: INDOMITABILITY
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Spiritual
Any Spiritualist under the power of "Indomitability" will see beyond life and death, and thus shed his primal fears. Enchantments designed to repel will fall short, and even the roars of the most mighty dragons will not budge the caster's feet.
